Record.BroaderTerm: Non-Neoplastic Connective and Soft Tissue Disorder
Record.Description: The cartilage along the articular surfaces of the bones may be attacked and destroyed, and the bone, articular capsule, and ligaments may begin to wear away (erode). These processes severely interfere with movement in the joint.
